task.title: Apply updated design spec and custom.css to todo-list UI
task.author: user

steps.summary: Requirement: apply the restored custom.css and updated design-spec.md to the todo-list app UI.
Reviewed custom.css/design-spec.md and inspected todo-list HTML output (handlers/handler.go, handlers/items.go) plus shared templates (shared/templates/base.go).
Replaced Tailwind-driven markup with semantic layout and only the allowed classes from custom.css; removed inline styles and icons to comply with the UI contract.

Updated shared base/login templates and all todo-list HTML fragments to match the new layout, spacing, and component rules (shared/templates/base.go, apps/todo-list/handlers/handler.go, apps/todo-list/handlers/items.go).
Serve custom.css from the todo-list app so the new layout styles load when running the app directly.
Added a /custom.css route to serve the root stylesheet from the app (apps/todo-list/main.go).
Aligned the app-template with the new UI contract by removing Tailwind classes and ensuring new apps serve custom.css.
Updated templates/app-template/handlers/handler.go.tmpl markup and added a /custom.css route in templates/app-template/main.go.tmpl.

evaluations.notes: No automated tests were run for UI markup updates.

final_summary: Aligned todo-list markup and shared templates with the updated design spec by replacing Tailwind classes and inline styles with the custom.css layout and utility classes, served the stylesheet from the app, and updated the app template to match the new design contract.
